data.actual_result: scrolls to the bottom then instantly goes back to the top.
data.expected_result: Able to scroll all the way to the bottom.
data.short_description: Certan user lists can become buged and unable to scroll to the bottom at certan resolutions
data.steps_to_repro: - In my case I have it maximised to where the window itself is ~1280 by 1440 pixels (rough estimate using the recording softwares rectangle select) - I am using the canary client on Arch linux on the Gnome desktop https://youtu.be/S44WTLGBHM8
